## Events

| Event       | Description                      | Type                                  |
| ----------- | -------------------------------- | ------------------------------------- |
| `itemClose` | Emitted only when item is closed | `CustomEvent<{ item: HTMLElement; }>` |
| `itemOpen`  | Emitted only when item is opened | `CustomEvent<{ item: HTMLElement; }>` |
